ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: $Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c && NOT($RecordType.Name = "Health & Benefits") && NOT( OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Received', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Locked', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Open', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'HB_Open' ) ) && $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator" && AND( ISCHANGED(Status__c), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Received'), OR( ISBLANK(Minimum_Earned_Premium__c), ISPICKVAL(Form_Type__c, ""), ISPICKVAL(Admitted__c, ""), ISBLANK(Premium__c), ISBLANK(Policy_Fees__c), ISBLANK(Wholesale_Fees__c), ISBLANK(State_Tax__c), ISBLANK(State_Stamping_Fee__c), ISBLANK(State_Fees_Other__c), ISBLANK(FS_Fees__c), ISBLANK(Carrier_Issuing_Company__c), ISBLANK(Program_Fee__c), ISBLANK(Risk_Management_Fee__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: One or more of the required fields are missing: Pricing, Form Type, Admitted, Minimum Earned Premium, Carrier Issuing Company, Program Fee, or Risk Management Fee.
